Socialising - Social Media

Provide students with social spaces in which they can form peer groups.

All of these examples can also be used for staff to answer questions, queries or concerns that are voiced.

Internal to the institution

  • Virtual learning environment plug-ins, e.g. WAMedu
  • A private social network, e.g. NING

External to the institution

  • Twitter – Promote the use of a Twitter Hashtag for the online orientation for socialising.
  • Facebook – use a Facebook page or group to for new students to use as a socialisation space.
